nodes.text: Moer was a terrestrial astronomical object located in the Dalon system, a part of the Hewett sector in the New Territories portion of the Mid Rim. It was the homeworld of the Human female Liadden, who by the age of eighteen had become a free-trader and the partner of the Twi'lek trader To'iir.

Moer was introduced in "A Free-Trader's Guide to the Planets," an article written by Timothy O'Brien and published in May 1996 in the tenth issue of West End Games' Star Wars Adventure Journal. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Dalon system, and therefore the celestial body Moer, in grid square M-7.
